column1: Traffic reports will resume Wednesday June 1 at 6:30 a.m.

column3: Traffic Alert for I-64E in Montgomery Co:
column4: The roadway is shutdown at Exit 101 (US-60) until further notice due to investigation of a serious collision at the 105 MM.

column3: Traffic Alert for I-64E in Montgomery Co:
column4: Traffic is being detoured at Exit 101 (US-60).  Motorists can expect long delays into Mt Sterling.
